trans-unit.source: Represents the drawing properties of the 3D border skin.
trans-unit.target: 表示三维边框外观的绘制属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of a skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置外观框架的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background gradient style of a skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置外观框架的背景渐变样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background hatch style of a skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置外观框架的背景阴影样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image of a skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置外观框架的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="string" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image alignment of a skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置外观框架的背景图像对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackImageAlignment%2A> property is used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled> drawing mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackImageAlignment%2A>属性由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled>绘制模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color that is replaced with a transparent color when the background image of a border skin frame is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在绘制边框外观框架的背景图像时，替换为透明色的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框外观框架的背景图像的绘制模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary background color of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框外观框架的辅助背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This color is combined with the primary background color, which is set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackColor%2A> property, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackHatchStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackGradientStyle%2A> properties are used.
trans-unit.target: 此颜色组合用主背景色设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackColor%2A>属性，当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackHatchStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackGradientStyle%2A>使用属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置外观框架的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the border line of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框外观框架的边框线的样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the border line of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框外观框架的边框线的宽度。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="integer" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page color of a border skin.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框外观的页面颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of a border skin.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框外观的样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkinStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkinStyle" /> 枚举值。
